item.description:
cookies and cider - vegan! Families welcome! Bring your favorite cookie to share. Organic whole grains, natural sweeteners (agave, coconut sugar, maple syrup, fruit juice concentrate), and fats (coconut, sunflower, safflower, olive oil, etc.) requested. Vegan - required! contact Dushenka if you need help with recipes, or converting an old standard.

Drop in to say hello or stay to chat for a bit and enjoy the assortment of vegan treats!
item.name: Cookies *we* can eat!
